system.requirements:
Tier 2; Agility 45, Ratling 
Aptitudes: Agility, Social
system.effect:
When making a Requistion, character can spend a Fate Point to automatically "acquire" a single small item roughly the size of a laspistol or smaller and of Rare Availability or less that might reasonably held within regimental stores. 
Larger items may be stolen with a reasonable plan or Agility Test at GM Discretion. If caught, punishments are significant, although quartermasters rarely perform full inventories and most authority figures don't care enough to question in detail.
If for whatever reason the character wishes to discreetly return the item, it is as easy/difficult as it was "acquiring" it.
